List of changes to libqpsd

## Unreleased

## v2.2.1 - 2019-01-13
### Changed
- Update copyright

## v2.2.0 - 2018-12-21
### Added
- CMake support

## v2.0.1 - 2018-11-07
### Changed
- Version for release (#23)
- Update README
- Update copyright

### Fixes
- QImage format on Qt 5.10+ (#19)
- 'make install' (#21)
- Crash for PSB files greater than 2GB (#22)

## v2.0.0 - 2017-10-31
### Changed
- Updated copyright date
- Refactored code
